name: bookstore_get_all_books
description:
Get all books in the catalog.

Args:
    limit: Maximum number of books to return (default 100)

Returns:
    List of all books in the catalog

name: bookstore_get_book_by_id
description:
Get detailed information about a specific book.

Args:
    book_id: The unique ID of the book

Returns:
    Book details or error if not found

name: bookstore_search_books_by_title
description:
Search for books by title.

Args:
    title_query: Search term to match against book titles
    limit: Maximum number of results (default 20)

Returns:
    List of matching books

name: bookstore_search_books_by_author
description:
Search for books by author name.

Args:
    author_query: Search term to match against author names
    limit: Maximum number of results (default 20)

Returns:
    List of matching books

name: bookstore_search_books
description:
Search books with multiple filters.

Args:
    query: General search term (matches title, author, description)
    author: Filter by author name
    genre: Filter by genre
    in_stock_only: Only show books currently in stock
    limit: Maximum number of results (default 20)

Returns:
    List of matching books

name: bookstore_get_books_in_stock
description:
Get all books that are currently in stock.

Args:
    limit: Maximum number of books to return (default 100)

Returns:
    List of books with stock > 0

name: bookstore_get_books_out_of_stock
description:
Get all books that are currently out of stock.

Args:
    limit: Maximum number of books to return (default 100)

Returns:
    List of books with stock = 0

name: bookstore_get_books_by_genre
description:
Get books by genre.

Args:
    genre: Genre to filter by
    limit: Maximum number of results (default 50)

Returns:
    List of books in the specified genre

name: bookstore_get_genres
description:
Get all available genres in the catalog.

Returns:
    List of unique genres

name: bookstore_get_authors
description:
Get all authors in the catalog.

Returns:
    List of unique authors

name: bookstore_get_current_user
description:
Get the current logged-in user's profile information.

Returns information about the currently authenticated user including
their name, email, and shipping address.

Returns:
    User profile with user_id, name, email, phone, and default_address

name: bookstore_check_availability
description:
Check if a book is available in the requested quantity.

Args:
    book_id: The unique ID of the book
    quantity: Number of copies needed (default 1)

Returns:
    Availability status and stock information

name: bookstore_buy_book
description:
Purchase one or more copies of a book for the current user.

This decreases the stock level and records the purchase under
the currently logged-in user's account.

Args:
    book_id: The unique ID of the book to purchase
    quantity: Number of copies to buy (default 1)

Returns:
    Purchase confirmation or error message

name: bookstore_get_purchase_history
description:
Get the current user's purchase history.

Returns the purchase history for the currently logged-in user,
showing all books they have bought.

Args:
    limit: Maximum number of records to return (default 50)

Returns:
    List of purchase records with book details

name: bookstore_get_purchase_stats
description:
Get purchase statistics for the current user.

Returns statistics about the currently logged-in user's purchases,
including total transactions, books bought, money spent, and their top purchases.

Returns:
    Statistics including total transactions, books sold, revenue, and top sellers
